sentences: Nad kannavad endaga kaasas v채ga palju raha.
Kannavad nad endaga kaasas oma pere ajalugu.
Ta kannab endaga kaasas 체ks 천nnelik p채ev.
context: The word 'kannavad' is the third person plural form of the verb 'kandma', which means to carry. It is commonly used in Estonian to describe someone carrying or holding something, whether it be physical objects or abstract concepts like emotions or responsibilities.
